exceptions.tactic: intros n f r Hr Hf.
intros n' f r Hr Hf.
intros n' f' r Hr Hf.
intros n' f' r' Hr Hf.

exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat f : nat -> nat r : nat H : 2 <= r H0 : forall i j : nat, i < j <= n -> f i < f j Unable to unify "S (∑ ?M1525 (fun i : nat => ?M1526 i * power (?M1527 i) ?M1524)) <= power (?M1527 ?M1525) ?M1524" with "S (∑ (S n) (fun i : nat => power (f i) r)) <= power (S (f n)) r".

exceptions.tactic: intros i j Hi Hj Hlt.

original: intros n f r Hr Hf. apply sum_powers_bound; auto. intros i j Hi Hj Hlt. apply Hf; auto.
